Package org.apache.pdfbox.examples.signature.validation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddValidationInformation
    An example for adding Validation Information to a signed PDF, inspired by ETSI TS 102 778-4 V1.1.2 (2009-12), Part 4: PAdES Long Term - PAdES-LTV Profile.
    CertInformationCollector
    This Class helps to extract Data/Information from a signature.
    CertInformationHelper  
    CrlHelper
    Helper class to get CRL (Certificate revocation list) from given crlUrl and check if Certificate has been revoked.
    OcspHelper
    Helper Class for OCSP-Operations with bouncy castle.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CertificateProccessingException
    Class to wrap around Certificate Processing exceptions
    RevokedCertificateException
    Exception to handle a revoked Certificate explicitly
